overview:
Mukesh operates as a Junior Team Lead having 6 years experience in Open Source (PHP) technologies, and mainly expertise in the LAMP technology projects. He Started in core PHP4, PHP5 with MySQL as back end, and switched to MVC framework technology.

Mukesh has created many complex back-end management systems including content management and e-commerce. He has executed projects based on PHP in conjunction with various other web development technologies. PHP ( PHP with OOP, PHP with frameworks), MySQL , JavaScript (generic JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX), XHTML, CSS, XML and SVN, and widely used the cake PHP framework. Mukesh also has experience working with Google APIs, PayPal APIs, Authorize.net, Facebook Apps, Twitter APIs, cURL, WSDL/XML, RSS, SOAP, Jquery, YUI and XHTML

In addition to the technical development domain, he contributes to the training of grads and new development professionals.
